mapper.select: SELECT id, username, password_hash, role, ref_id, status, created_at, updated_at FROM sys_user WHERE username = #{username} AND status = 'ACTIVE'
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_user SET password_hash = #{passwordHash}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_user (username, password_hash, role, ref_id, status) VALUES (#{username}, #{passwordHash}, #{role}, #{refId}, #{status})
